posts.post_content:
@xRockFan: The simple answer is yes, in that this can stop the damage a Lightning Bolt would deal. But it depends partly on what you mean by "blocking" it.  
It doesn't counter the bolt, or stop the targeted creature or player from being targeted by it, or prevent it from having been cast. Any effects that look for any of those will react accordingly.
posts.html:
@xRockFan: The simple answer is yes, in that this can stop the damage a Lightning Bolt would deal. But it depends partly on what you mean by "blocking" it.
